1.0.name: wordpress/restrict-content-pro-wp-job-manager
1.0.description:
Limit job submission and / or applications for WP Job Manger to paid subscribers in Restrict Content Pro This extension does NOT function without WP Jobs Manager AND Restrict Content Pro installed.

This extension has no options and will automatically require posters to have an active subscription in order to post jobs.

Learn more about Restrict Content Pro: http://pippinsplugins.com/restrict-content-pro-premium-content-plugin/
